I am a Machine Learning Research Analyst, Data Scientist and Microsoft Certified Data Engineer with a passion for leveraging data-driven insights to solve complex problems. With a Master of Science in Data Science from DePaul University, I specialize in machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis and visualization techniques. My research focuses on developing scalable solutions for medical imaging, predictive modeling, and business intelligence systems, backed by extensive academic research experience. Over the past decade, I have held leadership roles at Oracle and Infosys, where I led teams in creating data-driven solutions for large-scale enterprise applications. Driven by the intersection of data science and technology, I am continually working on innovative solutions to enhance decision-making and business outcomes.

          Designed a gesture recognition system using a hybrid 3D pooling CNN, achieving high accuracy in low-resolution environments with neural network and deep learning techniques for smart TV.

          Text-to-Image Generation for E-Commerce

          Developed a generative AI model using diffusion-based approaches for product image generation from text descriptions, enhancing e-commerce catalog imagery.

          Built a predictive model using Azure ML with 84% accuracy. Deployed via Azure BLOB storage, automating data preprocessing with Azure Functions.
